TopicTitle: My recent flight to Minmus, and exploring with a stock rover.

Articles.Content:
For this weeks /r/kerbalspaceprogram challenge the eager reddit Kerbolnauts were tasked with landing on the new miniature moon, here is my trip to this eerily beautiful worldlet.

Teaser pic.

![Cfrg0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Cfrg0.jpg)

[The full Imgur gallery of the flight.](https://imgur.com/a/XpWIy#0)
You should put two linear RCS thrusters on it instead (one pointing straight back and one pointing straight down). You get a LOT more bang for your buck that way.

Thanks guys, also I didn\'t know about how powerful those linear thrusters were till afterwards, I think they are way over the top.

RCS that can lift aircraft? Seriously? They should be changed into normal engines and use aircraft fuel, that\'s the only way they\'ll ever be balanced.

Nice! Awesome to see more all-stock players.

Our rover designs are pretty similar:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5HAtE-iHrHI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

That was beautiful, any chance you can share what music you used in your clip?

I didn\'t think of using the control surfaces, they are far lighter than the hardpoints I went for but I didn\'t know they\'d attach on the sides like that, that\'s a really nice method ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> That was beautiful, any chance you can share what music you used in your clip?
> 
> I didn\'t think of using the control surfaces, they are far lighter than the hardpoints I went for but I didn\'t know they\'d attach on the sides like that, that\'s a really nice method ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It\'s 'Cold Planet, by Brother Android

> 
> That was beautiful, any chance you can share what music you used in your clip?
> 
> I didn\'t think of using the control surfaces, they are far lighter than the hardpoints I went for but I didn\'t know they\'d attach on the sides like that, that\'s a really nice method ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

As OtherDalfite (and the information section on the video\'s page =P) stated, the song is 'Cold Planet,' by [Brother Android](http://brotherandroid.bandcamp.com/). I felt it rather fitting in both tone and title.
